entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a great Dark wizard who survived the Dark Lord's attack. He is described as mediocre and self-satisfied.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: A powerful entity that attacked Harry Potter, with followers who thought he might be a standard to rally around.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A close ally of the narrator, present in the castle and mentioned as being close at hand.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: The school where Harry Potter is supposed to be studying, according to the narrator.

entities.name: potter's father
entities.description: Harry Potter's father, described as obnoxious and self-satisfied.

relationships.description: The narrator has an opinion about Harry Potter's abilities and character.
The Dark Lord attacked Harry Potter, but he survived.
